name: No More Stables!
description:
You're a horse named Neigh-thaniel. And you're mad. It's time to free horse-kind from the bridle of humanity.

Controls

WASD / Arrows

Left Mouse / X

Right Mouse / C

F - Fullscreen toggle

M - Mute

P - *SECRET BUTTON* You can use this button to jump to the end screen, where you can use the jukebox to listen to any song in the game, or jump back to any of the 3 minigames. *USE WISELY*

These controls do different things in different parts of the game.

Think of WASD/Arrows as directional control, and Mouse buttons / X and C as input 1 and 2, think of an old console controller.

Attributions

https://freesound.org/people/Garuda1982/sounds/538912/

Woosh Sounds

https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Sans+Display/about

Font

https://freesound.org/people/monte32/sounds/353799/

Footstep sounds

https://freesound.org/people/Mafon2/sounds/377552/

Wood hit sound

Tools

BeepBox - Music

SFXR - Sound Effects

Godot - Engine

Aseprite / Paint.net - Art

Audacity - Audio Editing
